ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those that bring down the Reminder
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then cast (Allah's) remembrance (in people's hearts),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and by those who reveal revelations (to the prophets)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And then by those that instil Remembrance into the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then I swear by the angels who bring down the revelation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By those who bring down the Reminder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by those who bring down the reminder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those winds that bring down the remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the angels that bring the revelations to the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those [angels] who deliver a message
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:5] by the casters of the remembrance, that is, [by] angels that descend with the revelation upon the prophets and messengers, casting the revelation onto the [various] communities [of mankind],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By those who bring down the Reminder) and He swore by those who bring down the revelations,
